flashcards.cardback: Programs and Features - Allows you to uninstall or change installed programs.
Bluetooth Devices - Manages Bluetooth settings and devices.
Display Settings - Adjust screen resolution, orientation, and other display settings.
Windows Firewall - Provides access to Windows Firewall settings.
Add Hardware Wizard - Assists in adding new hardware devices.
Internet Properties - Configure internet settings and options.
Region and Language - Configure regional and language options.
Infrared - Manage infrared hardware and settings.
Game Controllers - Configure and calibrate game controllers.
Mouse Properties - Adjust mouse settings and configuration.
Sound Settings - Manage sound and audio devices.
Network Connections - Access network connections and configure settings.
Power Options - Configure power settings and schemes.
System Properties - Access system settings like computer name, hardware, and advanced system settings.
Tablet PC Settings - Configure pen and touch input settings (on compatible devices).
Phone and Modem - Configure telephone and modem settings.
Date and Time - Configure date, time, and time zone settings.
Windows Security Center - View security status and manage security settings.
Authorization Manager - Manage authorization stores and policies.
Certificates - Local Machine - Manage certificates for the local computer.
Certificates - Current User - Manage certificates for the current user.
Component Services - Manage COM+ applications and services.
Computer Management - Access various system tools including Disk Management and Event Viewer.
Device Manager - Manage hardware devices and drivers.
Development Mode User Configuration - Manage settings for developer mode and user configuration.
Disk Management - Manage disk drives and partitions.
Event Viewer - View and analyze event logs on your computer.
Shared Folders - Manage shared folders and sessions.
Group Policy Editor - Configure local group policies.
Local Users and Groups - Manage local user accounts and groups.
Performance Monitor - Monitor system performance and resource usage.
Print Management - Manage printers and print servers.
Resultant Set of Policy - View the effect of group policy on the system.
Local Security Policy - Manage local security policies and settings.
Services - Manage services running on your system.
Task Scheduler - Schedule and manage automated tasks.
Trusted Platform Module Management - Manage TPM security hardware.
Windows Firewall with Advanced Security - Configure advanced firewall settings.
WMI Control - Manage Windows Management Instrumentation settings.
